amendment.description: Amendment ensures confidentiality to individuals who call the toll-free hotline provided for in the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 110-78 to ensure confidentiality for members of the military who call the hotline for help.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown, Corrine amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Brown, Corrine.

House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Brown, Corrine amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
